headline: Why Coinbase (COIN) Is Up 5.5% After JPMorgan Highlights New Token Monetization Potential
summary: JPMorgan recently upgraded its rating on Coinbase Global, highlighting new monetization opportunities such as the potential launch of a Base token and expanded USDC incentives for subscribers. The upgrade occurred as analysts pointed to Coinbase's ability to capture additional revenue streams with a more stable outlook for decentralized exchange competition. We'll look at how JPMorgan's focus on proprietary token monetization may influence Coinbase's longer-term earnings narrative and...

headline: Decentralized Startup Funding: Is Coinbase Set to Shake Up Entrepreneurship Forever?
summary: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong aims to streamline the entire startup process, from formation to fundraising and public listing, onto the blockchain. In a recent appearance on the TBPN podcast, Armstrong elaborated on a future where founders can build their companies completely onchain. He said startups could register digitally, raise capital ...

headline: XRP Crypto Reclaims #3 Spot, Overtakes BNB: Institutional XRP News on Verge of Going Parabolic
summary: XRP crypto has roared back into the spotlight this weekend, surging past Binance Coin (BNB) to reclaim its position as the third-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, a ranking it hasn’t held consistently in years. headline: 'You Don't Need To Buy A Full Bitcoin': Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong Slams Idea That It Is Too Late To Get Into Crypto
summary: Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) CEO Brian Armstrong has rejected the idea that cryptocurrencies are too expensive for new entrants. “You don’t need to buy a full Bitcoin or ETH to get started,” Armstrong said Sunday on X. “You can start buying and holding ...

headline: AI crypto payments using Coinbase protocol explode with 4,300% weekly growth
summary: Agents using a payment protocol developed by Coinbase have grown exponentially over the past week. The number of transactions grew more than 4,300% to 957,000. The protocolhas received support from Cloudflare and Google.

headline: Coinbase’s x402 AI Payments Protocol Sees 10,000% Surge in Activity
summary: Coinbase’s experimental x402 payments protocol, designed to let AI agents and humans pay directly in stablecoins over the internet, has exploded in activity. Key Takeaways: Coinbase’s x402 protocol saw a 10,000% surge in transactions, processing nearly 500,000 payments in one week. The protocol revives the HTTP 402 “Payment Required” code ...

headline: Coinbase CEO Wants Every Startup to Launch, Fund, and IPO Onchain
summary: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong outlined his vision for bringing the entire startup lifecycle onchain during an interview on TBPN this week, from incorporation and fundraising to going public. Armstrong emphasized that capital formation on blockchain technology could democratize access to early-stage investments while making the fundraising process faster, cheaper, and ...
